逨字的基本解释

逨
lái
古同“来”，到来。

逨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lái］
［《廣韻》落哀切，平咍，來。］
(1)到来。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵与逨。见《宋史·宗室世系表五》。

逨字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　逨； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1259第08
【廣韻】落哀切【集韻】郞才切，?音來。【玉篇】來也，至也，就也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?洛代切，音賚。勞也。

逨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
逨字的起名意思

暂无。

Fascinating
Basic explanation of words
Fascinating
lái
Gu Tong "comes" and arrives.
Fascinating
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lái］
["Guangyun" fell mourning and cut, flat 咍, come. ]
(1) Arrival.
(2) Use words for names. Song You Zhao and Lu. See "Song History · Clan Lineage Table Five".
Fascinating
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　逨; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1259 Page 08
[Guang Yun] Lao Ai and cut [Ji Yun] Yan Cai cut, and the sound comes. [Jade articles] Come, come, come, come.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Luo Daiqie, sound. Lao Ye.
